column6: GHOSTS PART 4 The F.F. return from Siberia to find the Baxter Building-and the rest of New York City-under siege! The race is on to find the greatest force in existence-the Cosmic Cube!
column8: | writer:Mike Carey | penciller (cover):Marko Djurdjevic | artist:Tyler Kirkham | inker:Salvador Regla | letterer:Rus Wooton
